about_the_game:
This season pass includes all DLCs for XXZ: Dead Souls, Darkside, and Fanbook. The purchase of such a pass will help you save 33%.

Dead Souls

A married couple is going to fight against pretty Zombie girls. New game mechanics in the already-discovered XXZ world.
  • The squad consists of two people.
  • Heroes now have unique skills.
  • You choose who you attack.
  • Attacking troops get occasionally enforced with new members.

Squad

A squad of military officers from the secret base is trying to get access to the air field.
  • the squad now consists of 4 people.
  • new mechanics of interacting with enemies.
  • a new class of characters is available – “with a grenade”.
  • 20 missions.
Release on March 29.

Fanbook

Fanbook contain graphic materials which didn’t previously feature in the game.
  • Unpublished intro to XXZ.
  • Lots of Zombie girls that weren’t included in the game.
  • Sketches and drafts of the first versions of the game.

name: XXZ: Season Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware support WebGL - OpenGL 2.1 (GPU Memory - 1024MB)
  • Storage: 123 MB available space

short_description: This season pass includes all DLCs for XXZ: Dead Souls, Squad, and Fanbook. The purchase of such a pass will help you save 33%.
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Greek, Danish, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
